1000001100010011 0111001011000011 1 -> sum: 1111010111010111, cout: 0
1010011101100001 0001001111000110 1 -> sum: 1011101100101000, cout: 0
1111111110110101 1101100101000100 0 -> sum: 1101100011111001, cout: 1
1101110001111001 0100011100010000 1 -> sum: 0010001110001010, cout: 1

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
